alert.note: Alert for Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 17 at 1:40AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM EST FOR OCEAN COUNTY... At 139 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barnegat, or 11 miles south of Toms River, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A gauge in Beach Haven reported a 59 mph wind gust at 121 am. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Lakewood, Jackson, Barnegat, Beachwood, Manasquan, Point Pleasant Beach, Seaside Heights, Lakehurst, Surf City, Mantoloking, Leisure Village, Dover Beaches North, Holiday City South, Pleasant Plains, Warren Grove, Cedar Glen West, Jacksons Mills, Leisure Village East and Dover Beaches South. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 17 and 26. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 62 and 93. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This severe thunderstorm may contain little or no lightning. Do not wait until you hear thunder before taking cover.
